author: Joe Concha
title: Zuckerberg says stay-at-home protests organized through Facebook qualify as 'harmful misinformation'
description: Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg on Monday told ABC's George Stephanopoulos that protests against stay-at-home orders organized through his social media site qualify as "harmful misinformation" and are taken down."How...
